item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0703; 12:16PM; 2149 S Parnell Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CH7YGT; West Los Angeles; KNOCKDOWN: 24 firefighters extinguished the fire in 14 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters prevented the fire from extending up into the occupied floor. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 92; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC9 E237 E292 E37 E59 RA59 T37 T92; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0703; 12:02PM; 2149 S Parnell Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CH7YGT; West Los Angeles; Two story garage (one floor occupied over garage) with fire showing. Firefighter are in the offensive mode.; FS 92; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC9 E237 E292 E37 E59 RA59 T37 T92; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0201; 06:05AM; 8601 N Keokuk Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CKjfah; Winnetka; KNOCKDOWN: 28 firefighters fully extinguished the fire in 2 hrs and 9 mins with no injuries reported. There are remaining pockets of fire which are difficult to reach safely. Firefighters will continue to apply water and control, preventing them from reigniting while shift change occurs on scene. LA Building and Safety is responding to officially determine the status of the structure. The civilian patients earlier evaluated for possible smoke inhalation declined LAFD transport. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 104; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E104 E273 E296 E72 E87 RA104 RA96 T73 T96; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update CONTROLLED Structure Fire; INC#0201; 04:57AM; 8601 N Keokuk Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3yugK9K; #Winnetka; Thirty Firefighters have extinguished the bulk of the fire that was consuming a detached garage (reported to be a wood shop) behind a one-story home. Due to the heavy fire load (combustible contents), a formal "Knockdown" is yet to be called. Firefighters will remain on scene working to finalize extinguish of all hot spots. Two patients affected by smoke inhalation were evaluated by firefighter/paramedics, but refused hospital transport. Cause remains under investigation. Nothing further.; FS 104; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E104 E273 E296 E72 E87 RA104 RA96 T73 T96; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0201; 03:56AM; 8547 N Keokuk Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3yugK9K; #Winnetka; Detached garage with fire showing.; FS 104; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E104 E273 E296 E72 E87 RA104 RA96 T73 T96; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

#OrcasFire - Contained - Brush Fire; INC#0778; 01:20PM; Hansen Dam Recreation Area; MAP: https://bit.ly/hansendam; #LakeViewTerrace; LAFD ground and air units, with support from Los Angeles County (LACoFD) and Angeles National Forest (ANF) Firefighters responding in Automatic Aid, assisted by L.A. Park Rangers, have fully controlled the perimeter of the fire to a now estimated one-quarter (0.25) acre of heavy brush in the Hansen Dam Recreation area, a Mutual Threat Zone near the agencies' common border. No injury. No infra/structure damage. No evacuation. LAFD units will remain at scene for at least two hours to handle overhaul of smoldering debris. Fire cause under active investigation. ; FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 AR1 AR7 BC12 BC14 CE83 CM40 CM42 CW3A E24 E274 E275 E298 E7 E75 E77 E8139 E8140 E89 E90 EM12 H1 H3 H4 HA1 HA3 RA74 T74 T75 T98 WT77 + LACoFD + ANF + Park Rangers; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

#OrcasFire - Brush Fire; INC#0778; 12:10PM; Hansen Dam Recreation Area; MAP: https://bit.ly/hansendam; #LakeViewTerrace; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response with the Los Angeles County (LACoFD) and Angeles National Forest (ANF) Firefighters in Automatic Aid, to one-half (0.50) acre of heavy brush, with moderate rate of spread (potential for 3 acres?) in the Hansen Dam Recreation area, a Mutual Threat Zone near the agencies' common border. No injury. No infra/structure threat. No evacuation. This fire, within LAFD jurisdiction, is known at the "Orcas Fire".; FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC12 BC14 CW3A E24 E274 E275 E298 E7 E75 E77 E8139 E8140 E89 E90 EM12 H1 H3 H4 HA1 HA3 T74 T75 T98 WT77 + LACoFD + ANF; CH5; 17; - Brian Humphrey

Contained - Brush Fire; INC#1445; 08:50PM; Hansen Dam Recreation Area; MAP: https://bit.ly/hansendam; #LakeViewTerrace; LAFD ground and air units, with support from L.A. Park Rangers, have stopped forward progress of the three separate spot fires in medium-to-heavy brush to a total of approximately one-half (0.50) acre within the Hansen Dam Recreation Area. These fires were *different from and somewhat distant* to the fires earlier in the day (LAFD Incident #0840). No injury. No infra/structure damage. No evacuation. The specific cause of these and earlier spot fires remain under investigation.; FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC15 E24 E274 E275 E290 E60 E75 E77 E8140 E89 E90 E98 EM15 H2 H3 HA2 HA3 PB98 T74 T75 T90 WT77 + Park Rangers; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

Brush Fire; INC#1445; 07:30PM; Hansen Dam Recreation Area; MAP: https://bit.ly/hansendam; #LakeViewTerrace; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to L.A. Park Rangers report of three separate spot fires in medium-to-heavy brush within the Hansen Dam Recreation Area. These fires are *different from and somewhat distant* to the fires earlier today. No wind. No infra/structure threat. No evacuation.; FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC15 E24 E274 E275 E290 E75 E77 E89 E90 E98 EM15 H2 H3 HA2 HA3 T74 T75 T90; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

Contained - Brush Fire; INC#0840; 02:10PM; Hansen Dam Recreation Area; MAP: https://bit.ly/hansendam; LakeViewTerrace; Despite a slight wind, LAFD ground and air crews, with air support from ANF and LACoFD, have stopped forward progress of all spot fires in the Hansen Dam Recreation Area at less than two acres. No injury. No infra/structure damage. No evacuation. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 BC14 CM40 CM42 E18 E24 E275 E290 E298 E7 E75 E77 E8140 E89 E90 E91 E98 EM15 H1 H2 H3 HA1 HA2 HA3 PB98 RA18 T75 T90 T98 WT77 + ANF + LACoFD; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey
